ai-tha-ap356:2.1_0: Seeing her slave, full of flowers,
ai-tha-ap356:2.2_0: Regular monks offering him water for washing the feet.
ai-tha-ap356:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap356:3.4_0: this fruit is made from a net.
ai-tha-ap356:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Thera.
ai-tha-ap356:6.1_0: The Elder Kumārakassapa, who was the fourth, (who had) a full set of prise,
